com.ac.games.rest.controller
Class GameController

java.lang.Object
  com.ac.games.rest.controller.GameController

@RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/game")
public class GameController
extends Object

This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the core Game information.

It should handle all request that come in under the /game entry.

Refer to the individual methods to determine the parameter lists.

Author:
ac010168

Method Detail

getGame

@RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object getGame(@RequestParam(value="gameid")
                                     long gameID,
                                     @RequestParam(value="batch",defaultValue="1")
                                     int batch)
GET method designed to handle retrieving Game data from the database.

This method supports the following parameters:

  • gameid=<gameID> - The gameID. This is required.
  • batch=n - This indicates whether to generate a batch on game requests including bggID and up to 'n' additional sequential elements. Default is 1.

Parameters:
gameID - The gameID that we are using to base this request on.
batch - The number of rows to retrieve in batch from the server.
Returns:
A Game object or SimpleErrorData message reporting what failed.
